column4: what does this error mean? W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net maverick Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY D0AFF96872D340A3
i get that when i do apt-get update and i cant install any applications
but still.. i cant install applications
at the last line it says E: broken packages
sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get install mplayer vlc
next command will log you off, so first read:
sudo init 1         <<brings you to a simple gui where you can choose dpkg repair broken packages, run that, then sudo gdm start gets you back on the desktop
didnt work.. i coudnt even get to sudo init 1.. it said some error.. i cant remember. like cant get to init or something
